channel.title: Help me please!
channel.description:
1. I have this message when I try to log onto my server - "No response from server. Please try a different world". Who can explain this? How can I solve it?
2. Where can I find a fully functional attack bar? I've found tutorials but I get errors.
3. Sure, I can make the max stat 99. How do I change the required magic levels needed to cast a spell?
4. NPCs don't die when they lose all of their health points(HP). How can I prevent/solve this?
5. NPCs hit so much. I spawned a "Man", and it hit 20's and 30's. How can I solve this?
6. When I type "::char" I can change my appearance in my server. I made my character have NO beard or moustache. Yet, when I click on "Accept", I see a moustache on my server. Why is this? How can I solve?

item.title: Help me please!
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

There are NO errors on my server (meaning I can compile and run). I’m asking because I want to upgrade it. I’ve spent 2 months preparing my server. I can’t afford to get a new one.

Read full topic

Ok how is your rep 13 if you know none of this… Makes no sense. My advice is get a new source… And maybe learn a little bit about this game?

item.title: Help me please!
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

[quote=“gunztheduel, post:1, topic:88698”]1. I have this message when I try to log onto my server - “No response from server. Please try a different world”. Who can explain this? How can I solve it?

  1. Where can I find a fully functional attack bar? I’ve found tutorials but I get errors.

  2. Sure, I can make the max stat 99. How do I change the required magic levels needed to cast a spell?

  3. NPCs don’t die when they lose all of their health points(HP). How can I prevent/solve this?

  4. NPCs hit so much. I spawned a “Man”, and it hit 20’s and 30’s. How can I solve this?

  5. When I type “::char” I can change my appearance in my server. I made my character have NO beard or moustache. Yet, when I click on “Accept”, I see a moustache on my server. Why is this? How can I solve?[/quote]

Get a new source if you have that many problems.
